thread.section_title: L'Empire Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cannot Praise L'Empire Highly Enough
thread.title_full: Cannot Praise L'Empire Highly Enough - Review of L'Empire Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lenaDubai
title: Cannot Praise L'Empire Highly Enough
text:
I landed in Paris having lost my wallet en-route not a penny to my name! The hotel reacted super quickly sending a driver to pick me up at the hotel adding it to my bill. When I say driver I mean Boris who was the most entertaining kind funny company.
What could have been a stressful check in was handled reassuringly and with a real personal touch. All the team were warm friendly and super helpful.
Fantastic team. Great central location. Room was great. Won't hesitate to book here next time.
